name: 10 Jumps
description:
You have a pogo, the goal is to reach the pink flag and to do this you must jump with it and avoid obstacles!

The controls are simple, right and left arrow, and also r to reset... 

This game has been created for the Geta Game Jam #3 in 72 hours.

It was my first game jam so you can leave me a reply to  improve my next games! Thank you!
